mapper.select: select tab_domain.id,tab_domain.domain,tab_domain.state,tab_domain.service_type_id from tab_domain where tab_domain.service_type_id=#{serviceTypeId} and tab_domain.id not in(#{usingServiceTypeId})
select tab_domain_in_use.id from tab_domain_in_use left join tab_domain td on tab_domain_in_use.domain_id = td.id where service_type_id=#{serviceTypeId}
